entry.title: Friday: Periods of light snow. High minus 9.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow ending near noon then mainly cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Wind becoming north 20 km/h this afternoon. High minus 9. Wind chill near minus 20. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EDT Friday 17 March 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 19.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Wind north 20 km/h gusting to 40. Low minus 19. Wind chill minus 20 this evening and minus 28 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EDT Friday 17 March 2023
